com.MASTAdView
Interface MASTAdDelegate.AdDownloadEventHandler

Enclosing class:
MASTAdDelegate
public static interface MASTAdDelegate.AdDownloadEventHandler

The interface for ad download events. During normal processing begin() and end() will be invoked as the ad download progresses, and then onAdViewable() when the ad content is inserted into a view for display. If an error occurs, the error() method will be invoked. See the sample application source code for example source for this use case.

Method Summary
 void onAdViewable(MASTAdView sender)
          This event is triggered when ad content is inserted into an ad view for display, following a successful download of ad content, or in the case of an error, if the SDK is configured to re-use the last ad and a previous ad is available.
 void onDownloadBegin(MASTAdView sender)
          This event is fired before ad download begins.
 void onDownloadEnd(MASTAdView sender)
          This event is fired after ad content has been fully downloaded & parsed, and is ready to be inserted into a view for display.
 void onDownloadError(MASTAdView sender, java.lang.String error)
          This event is fired in the case of a failure to download content.
 

Method Detail

onDownloadBegin

void onDownloadBegin(MASTAdView sender)
This event is fired before ad download begins.

Parameters:
sender - The ad view from which the event originates.

onDownloadEnd

void onDownloadEnd(MASTAdView sender)
This event is fired after ad content has been fully downloaded & parsed, and is ready to be inserted into a view for display. It will NOT be invoked if an error occurs.

Parameters:
sender - The ad view from which the event originates.

onAdViewable

void onAdViewable(MASTAdView sender)
This event is triggered when ad content is inserted into an ad view for display, following a successful download of ad content, or in the case of an error, if the SDK is configured to re-use the last ad and a previous ad is available.

Parameters:
sender -

onDownloadError

void onDownloadError(MASTAdView sender,
                     java.lang.String error)
This event is fired in the case of a failure to download content.

Parameters:
sender - The ad view from which the event originates.
error - String error message. For example, if the server does not return an ad, the error method will be invoked and the error string will contain the message defined in Constants.STR_EMPTY_SERVER_RESPONSE.
